<NEW>

LEO PRIME had been watching TUSCON at first, examining his style o=
f
command and the way he was able to motivate his troops.

When TUSCON call=
ed for him to speak LEO took a moment to look at the
three Maximals as if w=
eighing each one in some internal balance.

Finally he spoke. "At the momen=
t the most important mission is
locating Rodimus and the other missing Maxi=
mals." LEO PRIME's voice is
low and authoritative. "All of our information =
is pointing to a large
forested area located at coordinates alpha 2279."

L=
EO glanced back at TUSCON and then at the three before him. "Scout
the area=
 and report back what you find." He looked at each of them
individually as =
if trying to implore them to work together, silently
asking them to disrega=
rd their differences for the betterment
of the team. This thought was manif=
ested in his next words, "All of you have skills that lend themselves to a =
small scouting party, but you would need to depend on each other to accompl=
ish it."

LEO leaned in towards them, "Can you do it?"

(TAG)

Preston
